summary: Army deserter Capt. Viktor Kaleb is offered a pardon and reinstatement in the cavalry if he agrees to lead a special forces group in a raid against an Apache stronghold into Mexico.
cast: Bekim Fehmiu|Richard Crenna|Chuck Connors|Ricardo Montalban|Ian Bannen|Brandon De Wilde|Slim Pickens|Woody Strode|Albert Salmi|Patrick Wayne|Fausto Tozzi|Mimmo Palmara|John Alderson|Doc Greaves|Lucio Rosato|Roberto Simmi|Larry Stewart|Gianni Vannicola|Giancarlo Zampetti|Manfredo Giusto|John Huston|Remo De Angelis|José Terrón
keywords: arizona territory|apache indian|tomahawk|sierra madre mountains|fort bowie
title: La quebrada del diablo
